item.title: donkey wash
item.description: “Had a little off-road adventure and got your donkey pal’s underbody dirty? Don’t worry bud, we’ve gotchu.” - some ad slogan probably. As some things are too good to be true, you probably realised that the Donkey Wash Inc. is only a fictional enterprise.

item.title: PS Shopware 6 Redesign
item.description: UI design iterations for the update of a webshop to Shopware 6. Main focus for me was decluttering the existing website and updating it to a more modern look.

item.title: Privacy
item.description: Personal data (usually referred to just as “data” below) will only be processed by us to the extent necessary and for the purpose of providing a functional and user-friendly website, including its contents, and the services offered there. Per Art.
